name: Neon Ninja (Funky_Mushroom)
description:
This game was created for the Amaze Me game jam 2021.

Run, throw, and dodge your way to victory in this crazy twin-stick shooter! Survive fifteen waves of various enemies, and collect neon upgrades to help you!

Windows only for now, but Mac and other stuff might come later. I plan to update this game in the future with more content and other neat stuff, so stay tuned!

Most controllers should work with this game, but if you're having trouble leave a comment and I'll see what I can do.

Keyboard controls:

WASD- Move

Left Click- Shoot

E- Pick up

1 and 2- Volume

Controller controls:

Left stick- Move

Right stick- Aim

RB- Shoot

A- Pick up

L and R- Volume

Credits:

Design- Funky Mushroom

Coding- Funky Mushroom

Art- Funky Mushroom

Music- Funky Mushroom

SFX- Funky Mushroom

Fonts- Funky Mushroom and FontsForFlash
